attributes.action: Give Preference to UK Trained Junior Doctors for Training Posts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The competition for training posts for junior doctors is ridiculous thanks to the House of Lords. I feel it is only fair that doctors who have spent 4-6 years and a lot of money training in our medical schools should have preference to training posts in the UK. I bet in other countries they have similar measures. This shows how the House of Lords knows nothing about the medical profession. I think their decision was wrong and misguided.
